home.title: Hi, I'm Miguel Mallqui
home.description: I am thrilled to continue learning and thus be able to offer even more impactful and effective solutions. You can contact me on LinkedIn.

about.title: About me
about.description: Hello! I'm passionate about technologies like Java, Power BI, and Python. I have experience in API development using Java and Python. Additionally, I'm immersed in the fascinating world of data analysis.

project1.title: mar - feb 2024 | Course Enrollment System
project1.description: A mini course enrollment system for university students, designed with Spring Boot and implementing a REST architecture, offers students a quick and easy registration process.

project2.title: mar - feb 2024 | Micritspon
project2.description: Un mini sistema de matrícula de cursos para universitarios, diseñado con Spring Boot e implementando una arquitectura REST, ofrece a los estudiantes una inscripción rápida y sencilla.
